title: 🎨 AHS Class of ’28 Logo Design Contest!
content:
We’re looking for a brand-new logo to represent the AHS Class of ’28 — and we want your creativity to shine! Submit your original logo designs for a chance to have your art featured across our website, social media, and class merch.

Guidelines:
- Must be original and school-appropriate
- Include “AHS” and “Class of ’28” somewhere in the design
- Digital or hand-drawn submissions accepted

Deadline: September 30, 2025
How to Submit: Send your design to our [Contact Page](./contact.html)

title: Crumbl fundraiser
content: We will be teaming up with Crumbl as a fundraiser. Check the fundraiser page for more info.

title: fundraiser committee
